QuestData.Title: Finding the Lost Expedition
QuestData.Description:
I saw a fire to the north of us. We're going to see if it was started by someone from the expedition.
You're the newest of our recruits, so you're staying with me.
Come. We move north.
QuestData.LogDescription: Search the nearby camp for expedition survivors.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Won'sa within the Abandoned Camp.
QuestData.RewardText:
So... hungry...
Dey took... everyone else... I be... da last one...

Objectives.Objective: Travel north to find any expedition survivors
